ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Stun/root
ygData.msgSnippet: Chalk it up to a humble bard who doesn t toot his own horn... Level 41 with the SG incident. -Faras
ygData.messageBody:
Chalk it up to a humble bard who doesn't toot his own horn...

Level 41 with the SG incident.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
> Sent: Saturday, March 04, 2000 1:46 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Stun/root
>
>
> From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
>
> Faras - this is an example of a post that depreciated it's
> value 90 percent
> by the simple fact that you didn't tell us your level...
>
> Remember people - when describing fights with mobs, etc -
> ALWAYS POST YOUR
> LEVEL!
>
> Thanks!
>
> Slyde 36 of Xegony
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Mike Roach" <Mike.Roach@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 2:37 PM
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Stun/root
>
>
> > From: Mike Roach <Mike.Roach@...>
> >
> > I noticed this last night with regard to chains, which I
> have kept memmed
> > all the time since I got the song (better safe than sorry
> when a runner
> > takes off, I like to have it as a backup just in case).
>
> <snuip>
> > -Faras
> >
